scenario: He was going through a jungle and his bicycle got punctured.
He was coming out of the bank and suddenly saw two Robbers.
He was sending an important message and suddenly the network went down.
He was going for his final exams and suddenly his mother fell ill.
You are a Doctor and Ten Patients came to your hospital at the same time for treatment.
He was going to a park and saw his girlfriend holding the hand of another person.
He was riding his bike and saw a man bleeding on the roadside.
It was the last day to submit the fee in his college and he forgot the money at home.
He was going to his office and saw smoke coming out from the window of a house.
She was coming out of the metro and suddenly realized her mobile was missing.
She was going for her final exams and she found that her admit card was missing.
He was going for an important meeting and suddenly his bike got punctured.
You are the captain of your basketball team and your main player has got injured.
You were walking back to your house and saw three men coming towards you.
He was the leader of a team and his team was lagging behind in achieving the target.
Hearing an unusual sound at night he woke up and found a thief jumping out of his window.
He was going to attend the SSB interview. On reaching the Railway Station he noticed that his suitcase had been stolen with his original certificates needed at SSB.
He found that he was being given step motherly treatment by his seniors.
He had to undergo an urgent surgical operation but there was no one to look after him.
He and his friends are required to go to the other side of the bridge but the bridge got damaged.
He heard the shouts for help and found a small boy being carried away into the water current.

His friend came to him frequently and demanded money on some pretext.

You are going for your final exams and all the buses in the city are not operating due to the strike.

She was returning back from her university and some students started protesting without any permission.

His parents want him to marry a wealthy and less educated girl and he has already found a suitable educated girl for himself.

An epidemic has spread in the village due to poor hygienic conditions.
A fellow passenger has fallen from a running train.
Ram wanted to become an engineer but his parents could not afford the fees of the course.
He is the main player of his team and he got injured before the final match.
He went to the government office for documents but a government employee asked him for a bribe.
He is the leader of his team but members of his team are not working efficiently and not taking the project seriously.
Rahul recently had a fight with his friend. But now Rahul needs the help of his friend.
